Constructor that calculates the rates
readReservation(String) - Static method in class CsvReaderWriter.ReadReservationFile
This method takes a csv file and reads through it using a buffered reader storing each value and eventually converting them to a reservation using the reservation class and object and storing them in a TreeMap The buffered reader reads the data column by column until it reaches the last column it then skips onto the next row and begins reading from column index 0 again until there are no more rows.
ReadReservationFile - Class in CsvReaderWriter
This class is designed to read through the file that stores all reservations and store each individual reservations in a TreeMap

run() - Static method in class model.menu.MainMenu
This method prints out all the options for the main menu, it uses the scanner to take in inputs The exception prevents the user of the system to choose an option or index outside of the possible options the system has This method is used to run the entire reservation system and it connects everything together
